scripts.copy:files: mkdirp ./dist && cp package.json ./dist && cp README.md ./dist && cp LICENSE ./dist && cpr config ./dist/config && cpr docs ./dist/docs && cpr quests ./dist/quests && npm run clean:distquests
scripts.build:release: npm run rebuild && npm run copy:files && npm run check:dist && npm run zip:files
scripts.clean: rimraf -g dist tmp src/**/*.js src/**/*.js.map Trap-CustomQuests*
scripts.lint:all: npm run prettier:check && npm run lint
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run lint:all && npm run build:release
